comments:
Wasn't able to replicate this bug, so I'm not sure what caused it.

I put a guard around it and we now issue a message if the content type is null.  If you see log messages related to active search please report them.  Note that Active Search is overdue for a revamp.
Mik, I wonder if last two comments can be merged into the same submission. E.g. Mylar can attach context to bugzilla issue when marking task as completed.
I would really like that.  It won't be trivial since we'll need something like a "Complete Task" wizard that allows multiple actions to be executed.  Feel free to submit a new report.
